title: National Geographic Channel Font?
content:
Friends -

I've searched this site and the web for information on what the font is that National Geographic is now using for their TV Channel. All of their ad spots, branding, etc., have this wonderful sans serif font that I can't quite figure out what it is.

The site is here: [http://channel.nationalgeographic.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121306/http:/channel.nationalgeographic.com/ "http://channel.nationalgeographic.com/")

I've also attached an image for your viewing pleasure as well.

Thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nategeoheader.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121306/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_164.png) | 8.31 KB |
author: rambls

comments.content: Donâ€™t know what the logo is, but the rest is FF DIN.
